The WP:Lead article says nothing about redirects. But all redirects are capitalized. This does not mean that all bolded words associated with redirects should be too.
Replace ==== Historical format of final tournament ==== which was not moved to a linked subpage as deleter stated.
capitalization of bolded names in lead section is necessary, because articles with identical names redirect here. See [[WP:LEAD]]; also, fix factual error on mass of trophy (see EL for details)

/* World Cup summaries */ not sure why flag adopted in 1940 is displayed for Hungary in 1938
Made change to Hungarian flag during the 1954 tournament. The flag of Hungary had a communist crest in the middle from 1949 to 1956.
/* World Cup summaries */ moving info to [[1954 FIFA World Cup]]
